title: Where can I download Microsoft Project free? - Quora

response.answer_text: If u are a student check with your school to see if they offer any free programs that go with your class schedule. If you are needing it for work, check with your employer to see if they offer it or have a disc somewhere in the office.else search in Google and take trail version of it then use it and after that for understanding purpose read technet.microsoft.com articles related to ms project and then buy or download it.

If you are a student check with your school to see if they offer any free programs that go with your class schedule. If you are needing it for work, check with your employer to see if they offer it or have a disc somewhere in the office.
